fields.Title: Government Programs Process: To-Be Workshop Report
fields.Outlet (if applicable): Submitted to Process Leads and Leadership of The Idaho Foodbank
fields.Description/Abstract:
This deliverable was one of several created for a process reengineering effort with The Idaho Foodbank. This technical report summarizes the work of the 8/3/21 As-Is workshop to create a map of the Government Programs process. The report included the following topics:
A. Government Programs Background Information
B. Stakeholders and Success Criteria
C. Participant Takeaways
D. Big Ideas--Major Initiatives Developed in the To-Be Session
E. Major Controls by Process Activity
F. To-Be Process Diagrams and Detail Tables
    Level 1 Process Map: Overall Government Programs Process Model
    Level 2 Diagrams
        1.0 Plan to procure product
        2.0 Procure product
        3.0 Receive product
        4.0 Repack product
        5.0 Distribute product
        6.0 Reconcile records (partner inventory)
        7.0 Report to government program
G. Spreadsheet of activities, disconnects, and solutions
